code: import React from'react';import'./Note.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Note=_ref=>{let{id,text,color,date,onDelete}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"note ".concat(color),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"note-text",children:text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"note-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"note-date",children:new Date(date).toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(id),className:"delete-button","aria-label":"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0437\u0430\u043C\u0435\u0442\u043A\u0443",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F"})]})]});};export default Note;
